sections.title: Syntax
sections.text_content: GUI.FontDraw (widgetID : int, textStr : string, x, y, fontID, Color : int)

sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
Performs a Font.Draw command to the canvas specified by widgetID.

This routine is essentially the same as the Font.Draw procedure in the Font module. All coordinates are based on the canvas and all drawing is clipped to the canvas drawing surface. If the canvas is in "xor mode", all the drawing will be done with "xor" set. (See View.Set for more information about "xor".)

The widgetID must specify a canvas widget.

Performs a _Font.Draw_ command to the canvas specified by _widgetID_.

This routine is essentially the same as the _Font.Draw_ procedure in the _Font_ module. All coordinates are based on the canvas and all drawing is clipped to the canvas drawing surface. If the canvas is in "xor mode", all the drawing will be done with "xor" set. (See **View.Set** for more information about "xor".)

The _widgetID_ must specify a canvas widget.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the procedure by calling GUI.FontDraw, not by calling FontDraw.
